data.title: Murder Mystery Co: “I Love the 80s to Death”
data.meta_description: Learn more about the upcoming Murder Mystery Co: “I Love the 80s to Death” event taking place in Atlanta.
data.text:
A 2.5 hour long comedic murder mystery where you play alongside professional actors to solve the crime (or not). We welcome you to “I Love the 80s to Death,” a 1980s battle of the bands concert with a deadly musical rivalry!

Prepare to unravel the secrets of a thrilling murder mystery, where every twist and turn leads you closer to uncovering the truth. Put your sleuthing skills to the test as you examine clues and mingle with suspects, all while enjoying a delectable three-course meal. But beware – you might find yourself a suspect in this gripping tale. Secure your tickets now for an evening you won't soon forget!
